title: Group of 50 photographs of P.O.W James Steele and regiment when stationed in Malaysia in 1941 (and 2 later photographs of Steele placing a wreath at ceremony of remembrance)  Sgt Martin (Marty), Naval Base Singapore 1941

physical_appearance:This is a black-and-white photograph. It features a man in a white collared shirt and pants. He is seated
 and is posing with his right hand on his hip and left hand resting on his left cheek. He is photographed amongst some short bushes and vegetation. There are no tears or folds seen on the photograph.

sgcool_label_text:A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony
 this collection is part of the archive of James Steele
 Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942
 when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.

metadata.title_text: Group of 50 photographs of P.O.W James Steele and regiment when stationed in Malaysia in 1941 (and 2 later photographs of Steele placing a wreath at ceremony of remembrance)  Sgt Martin (Marty), Naval Base Singapore 1941
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white photograph. It features a man in a white collared shirt and pants. He is seated, and is posing with his right hand on his hip and left hand resting on his left cheek. He is photographed amongst some short bushes and vegetation. There are no tears or folds seen on the photograph.
metadata.subject_terms_2: World War, 1939-1945 Portrait photography Singapore Naval Base
metadata.context_7: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
metadata.sgcool_label_text: A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony, this collection is part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
